attributes.action: REVISION OF THE HUMANS RIGHT ACT
attributes.additional_details: THE HUMANS RIGHT ACT SEEMS TO HAVE TOO MANY LOOP HOLES WHICH BENEFIT THE CRIMINAL  RATHER THAN THE VICTIM AND IN NUMEROUS CASES THESE PEOPLE CLAIM THEIR HUMAN RIGHTS TO FAMILY LIFE. DO WE REALLY WANT THESE PEOPLE TO LIVE IN OUR COUNTY , THE ANSWER IS KNOW. ANY SENSIBLE PERSON WOULD AGREE TO THIS PROPOSAL. THERE ARE  NO DOUBT OTHER SECTIONS OF THE ACT WHICH SHOULD BE REVISED OR OMITTED
